name: Cowspiracy
description:
Made for the Dublin 1GAM game jam in a weekend with the help of my friend Martin (visuals, audio, game design) and girlfriend (ship's computer voice) this is an endless game where you try to shrink and abduct cows to use as a fuel source.

You can't win, you can just get a higher score and have a few laughs. It's a wonky-controls comedy game.
